summary: Adds Ashley to your game as a potential follower and marriegable partner.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ce2d29] Install v1.0 if you have ECE with custom race Yginord installed[/color]

According to reports version 2.0 works for those who got CTD before. Thanks for reporting back.

[color=#ffff00] Install v2.0 if you have NO ECE with custom race Yginord installed[/color]

[color=#4c8e16]ASHLEY[/color]

Ashley is a breton female follower, based on my character i've been plaing with for a while now.
Marriegable and essential.
She does well with bows.

[color=#4c8e16]Location:[/color] Drunken Huntsman - Whiterun

[center] [img]http://www.kephost.com/images4/2014/2/19/a1_2014_2_19_9auhbkru8c.png[/img] [/center]

[color=#4c8e16]Class:[/color] Scout

[color=#4c8e16]Main Skills:[/color]
-Archery: 34
-Light Armor: 28
-Sneak: 35

[color=#4c8e16]Perks:[/color]
-LightFoot
-SilentRoll
-DeadlyAim
-CriticalShot

Please report any bugs, other issues in connection with her!


I would like to thank you for the permissions i got.
Really much appreciate them!
All of them listed under Credits.



[color=#ffff00]On the pictures and screenshots Ashley wears:[/color]


Tera armors - cfl02 cfl18 hefh16 Hefh19 - CBBE By Nausicaa
Original tera armors: Tera armors For Skyrim - UNP by Toad


Triss Outfitt For TES V Skyrim by Fraper


Thank all of you for the great works!

Special thanks to: blu377, edith,
Thanks for testing: untoldone

[color=#ffff00]Other:[/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51337/?]Ashley - scout follower BBP patch[/url] by TomTom37


[color=#ce2d29]CREDITS:[/color]


Bethesda for Skyrim

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] by apachii
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit[/url] by ECE team and tktk1

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrows[/url] by HelloSanta
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] by LogRaam
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE[/url] by Caliente


So much thanks again for the amazing works!

[color=#ffff00]Thank you for the great tutorials:[/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25673/?]Tutorial - Creating Standalone NPCs by Natilde[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33106/?]Standalone Followers Tutorial by zzjay[/url]

Other

Currently im working on an asian follower. I accept advices, recommendations, feedbacks.
If you are interested in her, i really would like to use sg hairs (originally created by authors making sims hair meshes, thats why all of them were removed from the nexus), i really would like to get the permission.
But none of the authors reply to my tons of emails ive been sending to them.
Any helps are appreciated and welcomed.

Work in progress:

[center] [img]http://www.kephost.com/images4/2014/3/7/a1_2014_3_7_z3r0grz76r.jpg[/img] [/center]
author: kumiiho
